body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Car XYZ, my name is Terry Wilson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi there, my name is Sarah Miller.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's a pleasure to assist you, Sarah. Can you provide me with your phone number, formatted as five five five, three eight two, four nine zero zero?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Could you also confirm your address, including the street number, street name, city, and postal code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is two five zero, Elm Street, Roseville, one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Sarah. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
